meanings.definition: Think about (something) too much or for too long.
meanings.sent1: I tend to overthink every decision I make.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, I overthink things and end up feeling stressed.
meanings.sent3: Don't overthink it; just go with your gut feeling.
meanings.sent4: She tends to overthink situations and make them more complicated than they are.
meanings.sent5: Overthinking can lead to unnecessary worry and anxiety.

meanings.definition: To think about (something) too much or for too long.
meanings.sent1: He tends to overthink every detail before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: It's easy to overthink a problem and get stuck in analysis paralysis.
meanings.sent3: I always overthink what to wear to a party and end up being late.
meanings.sent4: Overthinking can sometimes cloud your judgment and lead to indecision.
meanings.sent5: She tends to overthink things and miss out on enjoying the present moment.
